dcterms:creator: U. Bhattacharya
T. Mittal
R. Chandra
T. Randhavane
A. Bera
D. Manocha
dcterms:description: E-Gait includes 2,177 real gaits, each labeled with one of four emotion classes (angry, neutral, happy, or sad) by 10 annotators. It consists of two parts: Part 1 contains 342 gaits from diverse sources, and Part 2 consists of 1,835 real gait sequences.
dcterms:title: Emotion-Gait (E-Gait)

dcterms:creator: N. Fourati
C. Pelachaud
dcterms:description: Emilya is a dataset of emotional body expressions concerning different daily actions, containing 7 actions performed by 12 actors with 8 emotions. The dataset includes motion capture data of simple walking with 4 emotions (anger, neutral, joy, and sadness).
dcterms:title: Emilya
